summary.para: Used to determine how to compare two Shell items. uses this enumerated type.
0x00000000. This relates to the iOrder parameter of the interface and indicates that the comparison is based on the display in a folder view.
(int)0x80000000. Exact comparison of two instances of a Shell item.
0x10000000. This relates to the iOrder parameter of the interface and indicates that the comparison is based on a canonical name.
0x20000000. Windows 7 and later. If the Shell items are not the same, test the file system paths.
